title: [Large-scale] Development of Learning Strategies through Analysis and Self-reflection on Remote Education Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: University-level remote learning experience or familiarity with online education platforms
context.additional_context: Analyzes remote learning experiences of language learners in post-COVID-19 educational contexts and designs future learning strategies

learning_goals: Learners can articulate three or more personal/environmental challenges encountered in remote learning settings
Learners can distinguish two positive and two negative impacts of remote learning based on survey results
Learners can write a one-page report comparing peer learners' experiences through qualitative content analysis
Learners can establish three self-management strategies for future remote learning based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
